content: sts m1r k2 4 sts increase 15 sts total row 6 sl1 p1 k to mst p1 k to last 2 sts p1 p1tbl *repeat row 5 & 6 twelve times 48 sts overall increase 63 sts total row 7 repeat row 5 4 sts increase 67 sts total row 8 ws sl1 p1 k1 yo k2tog to mst p1 ssk yo to last 3 sts k1 p1 p1tbl * the twelve ridges of garter stitch and single row of lace eyelets make up the overall pattern repeat repeat *…* five more times this gives you the shawl in the sample if you want to customize it feel free to add repeats or remove them then work row 5 & 6 once more and work row 5 again finishing on the ws bindoff using basic method worked purlwise sl1 p next st psso *p next st pass prev st over * repeat *…* until all sts have been secured weave in any remaining yarn ends block lightly for best results and enjoy your finished shawl © 2023 the mouse army all rights reserved
